plots.content:
Made during the "Art Rush" weekend event!

streamed on twitch.

data.title: Néons, prototype 2
data.frDescription: Cette exploration consiste à empiler des pavages de spirales sur différents niveaux, organisés de manière à former un dégradé de couleurs. Cette création a une histoire intéressante: réalisée pendant 'Art Rush', un évènement artistique streamé sur twitch, une des roues du traceur s'est cassé en direct pendant ce dessin, on peut d'ailleurs l'observer sur le résultat par la déformation des spirales au centre.

plots.content: Ink drop on a simple curve shaping two tubes with an overlap creating some moiré effect. 100% cotton A4 watercolor from Arches, Diamine Pink Glitz ink.

data.title: Twin Tube
data.description: Ink drop on a simple curve shaping two tubes with an overlap creating some moiré effect. 100% cotton A4 watercolor from Arches, Diamine Pink Glitz ink.

plots.content:
This is another experiment with ink drop and spirals. (Which is something I did a few months ago too)

Experimented a bunch of other ideas, using pink and green:

I used a dropper to drop some ink on a canvas while the plotter was running.

It it the best opportunity to use the glitter ink which have great effect:

This is really hard to master and very unpredictable. I tried many different ideas:

data.title: ink drops in square spiral
data.description: I used a dropper to drop some ink on a canvas while the plotter was running.
